R0018.title: Search Result Manipulation
R0018.definition: Interfering with search engine results by providing invalid or illegal data.
R0018.description: Boosting the ranking of a keyword by mass-searching it, or creating associations between keywords by mass-searching them together.
R0018.influence: Interferes with the fair ranking mechanism of search engine results, or disrupts intelligent suggestions and related results for normal search keywords.

references.title: Search Results Severely Disrupted by SEO Manipulation: Experts Say Google Is Dying
Malicious Manipulation of Search Rankings Misleads Internet Users! How to Govern "Keyword Domination" and Other Black-Gray Market Practices
